Who Are We?

Bitcoin Buyer needs no introduction.

We’ve created one of the most in-demand trading systems that connect traders and brokers in the cryptocurrency sector. With a growing number of customers, our main goal is obvious: we want to make cryptocurrency investing accessible.

Why? Because if we’ve learned anything from all the economic and social turmoil during the years, particularly amid the pandemic, it’s that financial systems need to change.

“The reason we are all here is that the current financial system is outdated.” - Charlie Shrem

It’s our mission to accelerate this change!

“At this crucial time, telling someone about Bitcoin is not financial advice by all factors. It is life advice.” - Olawale Daniel

Become a part of this change and ensure your financial future!

Join Bitcoin Buyer today

Our Story

Let us tell you a story. About a small group of blockchain and cryptocurrency enthusiasts that more than a decade ago felt something big was about to happen.

“When I first heard about Bitcoin, I thought it was impossible. How can you have a purely digital currency? Can’t I just copy your hard drive and have your bitcoins? I didn’t understand how that could be done, and then I looked into it and it was brilliant.” - Jeff Garzik

When Bitcoin was released in 2009, not many people took BTC seriously. Sadly, cryptos were primarily associated with illicit activities and the Silk Road.

But that small team started exploring the capabilities of Bitcoin and the altcoins that followed. All in times when trading software and accessible tools were scarce! Just like BTC, the team had ups and downs but never gave up.

And when Bitcoin reached over $60,000 this year, many people finally realised that BTC is the best investment of our century. Even giants like JPMorgan embraced cryptocurrency!

And that small team established themselves as one of the best trading partners out there. Can you guess the name of the team? Bitcoin Buyer, of course!

Why are we different from other platforms? Because just like you, we’ve started from scratch - without white-collar shirts - working hard to create a better world! “I see Bitcoin as ultimately becoming a reserve currency for banks, playing much the same role as gold did in the early days of banking. Banks could issue digital cash with greater anonymity and lighter weight, more efficient transactions” - Hal Finney

Join Bitcoin Buyer today
